calendario.hero_subtitle: The New Beginnings 2026 Calendar is more than just dates: each month offers rituals, crystals, and reflections to help you live with clarity, gratitude, and purpose. A practical and accessible guide to taking care of yourself and connecting with yourself throughout the year.

calendario.story_body: We’ll craft the full story with the team’s voice. Treat this block as a placeholder while the Luna Limón crew writes the final copy.

calendario.feature_connect_body: Every month greets you with reflections, questions, and simple prompts so you can move through the year with intention.
calendario.feature_crystals_body: Each month includes a suggested crystal that resonates with its energy.
calendario.feature_rituals_body: A practical guide to stay balanced and manifest your intentions. Includes 12 monthly rituals with simple, meaningful steps to reconnect with your purpose and savor everyday moments.
calendario.feature_notes_body: Every month invites you to write what you feel, what you learn, or what you want to celebrate.
calendario.feature_care_body: Crafted with planet-friendly materials—caring for yourself also cares for your surroundings. Each detail is a reminder that you can always begin again.
calendario.story_intro:
More than an organizing tool, this calendar is a guide that stays with you all year—full of magic, rituals, crystals, and moments to reconnect with yourself.

Each month invites you to pause, be present, and honor your rhythm with simple practices that nurture your mind, body, and spirit.
calendario.story_manifesto:
For you, who want to transform the everyday into something special.
For those who believe in the magic of small gestures: a word, a pause, a deep breath.
This calendar was created to remind you of that, day after day.
calendario.story_includes_list:
12 months of insights to move through each season more consciously—paired with crystals, checklists, and prompts for looking within.
12 monthly rituals to connect with your energy and renew your intentions.
Monthly planners to organize your days from a grounded place.
Space for notes: perfect for reflections, gratitude, or the month’s special moments.
Sticky notes to highlight what matters.
1 notepad for your own phrases or affirmations—the ones that inspire and lift your energy every day.
2 sheets of stickers to brighten your experience and add color to your days.
